name: DeepChem
short_description: An open-source toolkit for deep learning in drug discovery and quantum chemistry.
long_description: DeepChem is a robust Python library that democratizes deep learning for the life sciences. It offers tools for molecular modeling, cheminformatics, and bioinformatics, enabling researchers to build predictive models for molecular properties and biological activities.

name: Chemprop
short_description: A message-passing neural network for molecular property prediction.
long_description: Chemprop is a machine learning framework for predicting molecular properties using graph neural networks. It is designed to support regression and classification tasks and offers high accuracy across a wide range of chemical datasets.

name: MoleculeNet
short_description: A benchmark for molecular machine learning.
long_description: MoleculeNet provides standardized datasets and evaluation protocols for machine learning on molecular data. It includes diverse datasets for tasks like quantum mechanics, physical chemistry, biophysics, and physiology, making it a key resource for model benchmarking.

name: AutoDock
short_description: A suite of automated docking tools.
long_description: AutoDock is a molecular modeling simulation software especially effective for predicting how small molecules bind to a receptor of known 3D structure. It is widely used in virtual screening and structure-based drug design.

name: RDKit
short_description: An open-source cheminformatics toolkit.
long_description: RDKit is a collection of cheminformatics and machine learning tools that supports SMILES parsing, substructure search, molecular fingerprints, and more. It integrates well with Python and is commonly used in both academia and industry.

name: AlphaFold
short_description: AI system that predicts protein structures.
long_description: AlphaFold is an AI system developed by DeepMind that predicts the 3D structures of proteins from amino acid sequences. It has revolutionized structural biology and is critical in structure-based drug design and target validation.

name: OpenEye Orion
short_description: Cloud-native platform for drug discovery.
long_description: OpenEye Orion is a cloud-based computational chemistry platform that supports large-scale modeling, virtual screening, and cheminformatics workflows. It integrates visualization, data management, and high-performance computing capabilities.

name: Schrödinger Suite
short_description: Comprehensive modeling platform for drug design.
long_description: The Schrödinger Suite offers molecular modeling, simulation, and cheminformatics tools that support the entire drug discovery pipeline. It includes capabilities for molecular docking, quantum chemistry, and machine learning-enhanced design.

name: BioSolveIT SeeSAR
short_description: Interactive platform for structure-based design.
long_description: SeeSAR is a visual and interactive platform from BioSolveIT that aids medicinal chemists in structure-based drug design. It enables users to visualize protein-ligand interactions, optimize compounds, and run docking simulations efficiently.

name: IBM RXN for Chemistry
short_description: AI-powered platform for chemical reaction prediction.
long_description: IBM RXN for Chemistry is a cloud-based platform that uses AI to predict chemical reactions, perform retrosynthesis planning, and assist in reaction optimization. It combines transformer models with intuitive user interfaces for chemists.

name: MolBERT
short_description: A transformer-based model for molecular representation learning.
long_description: MolBERT is a BERT-like language model tailored for molecules represented as SMILES strings. It leverages unsupervised pretraining to learn contextualized molecular embeddings that improve downstream tasks such as property prediction and molecule generation.

name: ReLeaSE
short_description: Reinforcement learning for de novo drug design.
long_description: ReLeaSE (Reinforcement Learning for Structural Evolution) is an AI framework that combines deep generative models and reinforcement learning to design novel chemical compounds with desirable biological properties.

name: MolGAN
short_description: A generative adversarial network for molecular graphs.
long_description: MolGAN is a generative model for small molecular graphs using GANs and reinforcement learning. It can generate molecules directly as graphs, avoiding limitations of SMILES-based representations.

name: MegaSyn
short_description: Toolset for generative molecular design.
long_description: MegaSyn is a suite of generative AI tools for creating novel molecules with desirable properties. It includes generative models, property predictors, and synthetic feasibility analysis to streamline early-stage drug discovery.

name: Chematica (Synthia)
short_description: AI-based retrosynthesis planning platform.
long_description: Chematica, now commercialized as Synthia, is an AI-driven tool that helps chemists plan synthetic routes. It uses reaction databases and expert-curated rules to identify efficient and novel synthesis pathways.

name: AIDrugApp
short_description: Web-based platform for AI-driven drug discovery.
long_description: AIDrugApp is a user-friendly web application that integrates deep learning models to predict molecular properties and drug-likeness. It allows researchers without coding experience to harness AI in drug discovery.

name: DeepLigBuilder
short_description: Deep learning-based ligand structure generation tool.
long_description: DeepLigBuilder generates 3D structures of small molecules with deep generative models. It aids in ligand-based drug design by constructing chemically valid molecules based on user input or templates.

name: GraphAF
short_description: Autoregressive flow-based model for graph generation.
long_description: GraphAF is a flow-based deep generative model that builds molecular graphs atom-by-atom in an autoregressive manner. It achieves high-quality molecule generation and supports property-constrained design.

name: PathFinder
short_description: Enumerative AI-based reaction pathway generator.
long_description: PathFinder by Schrödinger is an AI tool that rapidly enumerates synthetically accessible compound libraries by exploring known reactions. It aids in hit expansion and lead optimization during drug discovery.

name: PostEra Manifold
short_description: AI-powered synthesis planning and molecule search platform.
long_description: Manifold is a tool from PostEra that combines AI and medicinal chemistry to help design synthetically accessible molecules. It predicts reaction routes and matches molecules with suppliers and reagents.

name: MolecularRNN
short_description: Recurrent neural network for SMILES generation.
long_description: MolecularRNN is a recurrent neural network trained on SMILES to generate novel molecules. It captures sequential dependencies in molecular strings to create syntactically valid and drug-like structures.

name: TDC (Therapeutics Data Commons)
short_description: Resource platform for AI in therapeutics.
long_description: Therapeutics Data Commons (TDC) provides machine learning-ready datasets and evaluation pipelines for drug discovery, covering tasks like ADMET prediction, biomarker discovery, and drug combination prediction.

name: SMILES Transformer
short_description: Transformer-based model for chemical structure embedding.
long_description: The SMILES Transformer is a pretrained transformer model designed to encode molecular structures in SMILES format. It facilitates transfer learning for downstream QSAR tasks and molecular classification.

name: ChemAI
short_description: Machine learning platform for chemical property prediction.
long_description: ChemAI is a web platform offering tools for predicting chemical and physical properties of compounds using state-of-the-art machine learning models. It supports rapid prototyping for research and development.

name: DeepSynergy
short_description: Deep learning model for predicting drug synergy.
long_description: DeepSynergy is a neural network-based approach to predict the synergistic effects of drug combinations. It integrates molecular and transcriptomic data to model interaction outcomes.

name: ADMETlab 2.0
short_description: Online platform for ADMET property prediction.
long_description: ADMETlab 2.0 is an enhanced online platform that predicts absorption, distribution, metabolism, excretion, and toxicity properties of chemical compounds using machine learning models.

name: SAVI
short_description: Synthetic accessibility-based virtual inventory.
long_description: SAVI (Synthetically Accessible Virtual Inventory) is a freely available database of virtual molecules curated for synthetic feasibility. It uses reaction-based enumeration for chemical space exploration.

name: TargetNet
short_description: Bioactivity prediction against multiple targets.
long_description: TargetNet is a web-based tool that predicts the bioactivity of compounds across a wide range of protein targets using QSAR models trained on large bioactivity datasets.

name: MolDesigner
short_description: Interactive tool for molecular design.
long_description: MolDesigner is a cheminformatics tool for building and editing molecular structures interactively. It integrates property prediction and fragment-based design to support medicinal chemistry workflows.

name: ChemCrow
short_description: Language agent for chemical automation tasks.
long_description: ChemCrow is a chemistry-focused large language model agent that integrates over 18 specialized tools to help with retrosynthesis, safety analysis, experimental design, and literature searches in chemical research.

name: PharmaNet
short_description: CNN-RNN hybrid for predicting drug-target interactions.
long_description: PharmaNet is a deep learning framework that combines convolutional and recurrent neural networks to predict interactions between drugs and target proteins based on molecular descriptors and SMILES strings.

name: DeepTox
short_description: Deep learning for chemical toxicity prediction.
long_description: DeepTox applies deep neural networks to predict chemical toxicity using molecular descriptors. It was a top-performing model in the Tox21 challenge and demonstrates how AI can enhance predictive toxicology.

name: PolypharmDB
short_description: AI-predicted polypharmacology drug database.
long_description: PolypharmDB is a database of AI-predicted drug-target interactions designed for polypharmacology. It uses deep learning to assess potential targets for existing and novel drug-like molecules.

name: ChemAIBox
short_description: Modular AI toolbox for chemical research.
long_description: ChemAIBox is an extensible platform for integrating machine learning models in chemistry workflows. It provides a suite of tools for property prediction, molecule generation, and data analysis.

name: AutoQSAR
short_description: Automated QSAR modeling tool.
long_description: AutoQSAR by Schrödinger automates the process of building quantitative structure–activity relationship (QSAR) models. It uses machine learning to identify predictive molecular features and outputs high-quality models for activity prediction.

name: MoleculeACE
short_description: Tool for benchmarking molecular generative models.
long_description: MoleculeACE is a benchmarking suite for evaluating molecular generative models. It assesses validity, novelty, uniqueness, and chemical space coverage to guide AI-driven molecule generation.

name: ORGANIC
short_description: GAN-based molecular generation with reinforcement learning.
long_description: ORGANIC combines generative adversarial networks (GANs) with reinforcement learning to create novel molecules optimized for desired properties. It can be used to explore drug-like chemical space efficiently.

name: RXNMapper
short_description: Transformer-based atom-mapping tool for reactions.
long_description: RXNMapper is a fast and accurate atom-mapping tool for chemical reactions based on unsupervised transformer models. It facilitates reaction analysis and retrosynthesis by identifying atom correspondences in reactants and products.
